*(M. Košťál)*

- [Presentation](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1oQU1cEDKKvLCveYmUYccWLWlmZoE5FQ3/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=105203881160814331075&rtpof=true&sd=true)
- Recommended software/addons
    - [PureRef](https://www.pureref.com/) (reference image tool)
    - [Magnific AI](https://magnific.ai/) (image upscaler/enhancer)
    - [Bledner addons market](https://superhivemarket.com/)
    - [GeoScatter](https://geoscatter.com/) and [Botaniq](https://superhivemarket.com/products/botaniq-trees) for vegetation
    - [Blender Studio](https://studio.blender.org/welcome/) for *paid* but priceless tutorials
